item.title: Hello world with Plone and Riot (Javascript frontent library)
item.description: I’m working on a somewhat weird experiment. My end goal is to have a user friendly (and mobile friendly) faceted search interface over the items of a collection. Seen through the eyes of my recent experience with VueJS, the classic Plone frontend APIs, such as JQuery and Patternslib/Mockup seem outdated and hard to digest. Any dedicated frontend UI library will seem much friendlier. My self-imposed requirements were: easy to work with, easily integrated.
